name: Barista Trainer
description:
This is my entry for Weekly Gam Jam - Week 159 - Cafe'

Barista Trainer - Get your barista certification and start your own café 

The idea of this game is to train and certify yourself as a  barista.I initially  wanted to add more levels  with new ingredients and coffee types, . however due to the approaching deadline decided to stop since I might not be able to complete it on time.

This is my second jam

How to Play

  • Drag and drop ingredients to cup to make the coffee shown in the server's tray.
  • Drag and drop cup to server's tray to serve.
  • You can empty the contents to sink if you made a wrong combination.
  •  You can refer to coffee reference manual for help.
  •  When you are ready, you can take the certification exam where you will be timed. If you finish the certification exam  successfully, you will be awarded with a certificate

Fonts:  Quiska. Yorkwhiteletter. Black Coffee, Nowherebound
Music:  Alex McCulloc , Spring - OpenGameArt
SFX: 8Bit, Fupi, Rubberduck, Wobblebox.com - OpeGameArt

All other assets are created by me 

Hope you enjoy playing. if you have any comments. do let me know .
 Thanks
